General.Name: Y-Optics Manufacture Co. Ltd
General.Description: Y-Optics Manufacture Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of polyethylene films. The company offers low density polyethylene, linear low density polyethylene, and high density polyethylene products. It also provides films, lamination films, general packaging films, and scratch wrap films. The company was formerly known as Shinhoo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Y-Optics Manufacture Co., Ltd. in August 2016. Y-Optics Manufacture Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Busan, South Korea.
